  • Field Details

    • STACK_SIZE

      public static final Configurations.Entry<Long> STACK_SIZE
      The default stack size in KiB of MemoryStackPREVIEW.

      The default value is 64.

    • STACK_FRAMES

      public static final Configurations.Entry<Integer> STACK_FRAMES
      The default stack frames of MemoryStackPREVIEW.

      The default value is 8.

    • DEBUG

      public static final Configurations.Entry<Boolean> DEBUG
      Enable debug messages and prints to OverrunGL.apiLogger().

      The default value is false.

    • DEBUG_STACK

      public static final Configurations.Entry<Boolean> DEBUG_STACK
      Enable using debug memory stack.

      The default value is false.

    • DEBUG_MEM_UTIL

      public static final Configurations.Entry<Boolean> DEBUG_MEM_UTIL
      Enable debug memory util to check memory leaks.

      The default value is false.

    • DEBUG_MEM_UTIL_FAST

      public static final Configurations.Entry<Boolean> DEBUG_MEM_UTIL_FAST
      Disable stacktrace in debug allocator.

      The default value is false.

    • CHECKS

      public static final Configurations.Entry<Boolean> CHECKS
      Enable checks.

      The default value is true.

    • GL_FORCE_CHECK_ALL

      public static final Configurations.Entry<Boolean> GL_FORCE_CHECK_ALL

      The default value is false.
